newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - County Wake, N.C..

text.p: Sealed bids for the above-captioned bonds will be received by the Local Government Commission of North Carolina at its office in the Albemarle Building, Room 411, 325 North Salisbury Street, Raleigh, North Carolina 27603-1385 until 11 o'clock A.M., North Carolina Time, on:

such bids to be opened in public at said time and place on said day for the purchase of the following bonds of the County of Wake, North Carolina dated March 1, 1997, and maturing (subject to the right of prior redemption) in annual installments on March 1 as follows:
Year Amount Year Amount Year Amount
all as described in the detailed Notice of Sale.

The bonds will be general obligations of the County, secured by a pledge of its full faith and credit. The approving opinions of Hunton & Williams and Bode, Call & Stroupe, L.L.P. of Raleigh, North Carolina, will be
furnished to the successful bidder at the expense of the County.

Copies of the Official Statement and the Notice of Sale and Bid Form relating to the bonds may be obtained from the Local Government Commission (919-733-3064). The sale is subject to standard North Carolina conditions of sale, including a required deposit, all as described in the detailed Notice of Sale. Each bid must be submitted on a bid form contained in the Notice of Sale and Bid Form. The bonds will be delivered on or about March 11, 1997, against payment therefor in Federal Reserve Funds at The Depository Trust Company.
